entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
